about_the_game:
Mythology 2 Book

This Mythology 2 Book brings 20 new images to Coloring Pixels! Each image depicts different Characters and Moments from Ancient Mythology from various cultures!


The second book of its kind to let you visit the legends of old!

Contents

The Mythology 2 book unlocks the following images:


  • Berserker - 81x90
  • The Flying Dutchman - 100x100
  • Centaur - 100x105
  • Osiris - 118x238
  • Lord Krishna - 120x173
  • Fairies - 145x130
  • Hippogriff - 149x141
  • Freya - 150x150
  • The Archangel - 160x125
  • King Midas - 160x170
  • Odin - 184x227
  • Odysseus vs Cyclops - 200x110
  • Bodhi Tree - 200x170
  • The Ark - 200x200
  • Theseus vs Minotaur - 220x155
  • Hermes - 225x255
  • Guan Yu - 240x250
  • Anubis and Amun - 247x232
  • 300 - 250x150
  • Werewolf - 250x220

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX 10.11
  • Processor: Intel i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound

name: Coloring Pixels - Mythology 2 Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 8.1
  • Processor: Intel i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX960
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound
